name: Hectic Henry
description:
You control Henry... sort of. Just set the jump of the character and watch Henry trying to reach the exit on its own. He will jump, bump, break crates and fall into lava and
sometimes reach the exit.

Controls

  • Use the mouse to set the jump.
  • Press Space to restart the level
  • Press 'e' to toggle screen effect
  • Press escape to exit

Challenge

Try to exit a level with at least 10 coins, can you do it on every level?

Assets Used

  • Monogram font: https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram
  • Inca Game Assets : https://kronbits.itch.io/inca-game-assets

Software Used

  • Love Game Engine: https://love2d.org/
  • Ogmo Level Editor: https://ogmo-editor-3.github.io/
